mapper.insert: insert into notice (nNo, title, regdate, contents, pub) values (seq_notice_nNo.nextval, #{title}, sysdate, #{contents}, #{pub})
mapper.update: update notice set title=#{title}, contents=#{contents}, pub=#{pub} where nNo=#{nNo}
